title: Ray
description: Four men... One challenge.The Dad Bod Doms are ready to put the spark back in their relationships and prove their mettle.By trying to save my marriage… I may have just ended it.I have an amazing wife and I’m not about to lose her because I stopped putting in an effort.As a former Army Captain, I decided to bite the bullet and get my act together.It was time to put boots on the ground and show her who’s the Master in our house .Only problem is… now she thinks I’m having an affair.She’s the only one for me and I’ll fight to keep what’s mine.It’s time I remind my wife what Army strong really means.The Dad Bod Doms Collection1. Logan by Golden Angel2. Henry by Raisa Greywood3. Ray by Maren Smith4. Faris by Shane Starrett
author: Maren Smith
